DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Specimen Requirement Tissue Site java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An aggregate of cells with similar or identical specialized characteristics, contributing to the performance of a specific function.  Tissues are parts of organs.  Representative examples include epithelium, lymphoid tissue, and connective tissue.:A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory._An aggregate of cells with similar or identical specialized characteristics, contributing to the performance of a specific function.  Tissues are parts of organs.  Representative examples include epithelium, lymphoid tissue, and connective tissue.:A position in relation to its surroundings._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
